title: Publications
text: Feltman, B., Warwick, A.R., Knowlton, G., Pomeranz, E., Zwickle, A., Burmann, L., Burroughs, J., Schweihofer, J., Conklin, T., Montri, D. and Isenhoff, D., 2024. Wild game processors’ perceptions of chronic wasting disease risks in Michigan. Human Dimensions of Wildlife, 29(5), pp.513-521. Download

title: Garrett J. Knowlton
text:
Hi, my name is Garrett Knowlton. I am a graduate student at the University of Wisconsin-Madison in the Ecosystem and Landscape Ecology Lab. My research interests include landscape ecology, forest ecosystems, disturbances (especially fire), simulation modeling, and climate change adaptation.

Education
University of Wisconsin - Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA PhD in Integrative Biology | 2024 - Present
University of Wisconsin - Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA MS in Integrative Biology | 2022 - 2024
Michigan State University, East Lansing, Michigan, USA B.S. in Fisheries and Wildlife Biology | 2015-2020


Experience
National Park Service, Climate Change Response Program | Research Assistant | 2021-2022
NASA DEVELOP | Remote Sensing Intern | 2021
